Articles.Content:
Here it is. Just a simplified model of GEMINI IVA. for example for FASA's Gemini capsule. or may be own pod someday.

with dumb panels yet. but work on RMPing it are in progress. Heavy... but like new squad's IVA's MU. 

**how it was**

**how it are** 

initial

OHHHHHH!!!!! Can't wait to see this in action!

Very nice...Gemini my favorite spacecraft!!!

I hope you release this soon as you can!

Thanks DennyTX
So beautiful! My ram gonna meltdown if I install this.

very nice!!!

p.s. would you done CM IVA?
Jeez, the detail on this is amazing.

> 
> very nice!!!
> p.s. would you done CM IVA?

already done. but not ready for release
Wow! This is fantastic. Nice work.
BTW if You per chance will be releasing IVA, I suggest putting RPM MFD where the real gusmobile had scroller with procedures checklist.
